item.title: TCEB commemorates achievements in Thailand's MICE Venue Standard
item.description:
Forty-two venues in Thailand have now received the Thailand MICE Venue Standard award from the Thailand Convention and Exhibition Bureau (TCEB). The announcement was made at the Thailand MICE Venue Standard Certification Ceremony held last month. This standard is a key element of a robust plan to accelerate the growth of Thailand’s MICE industry. Emphasizing Thailand’s prominent role in the region, TCEB underscored the need to utilize the expertise of MICE operators...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/tceb-commemorates-achievements-in-thailand-s-mice-venue-standard/
